location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The map has been inserted upside down into the volume.
Foliation: A pencil number enclosed in a circle is located in the top right hand corner of the recto of the folio.Materials: 1 blue tracing sheetDimensions: 505mm x 300mm

mods.abstract: Tracing showing Bahrain side of Bushire-Bahrain submarine cable, route of cable shown with thick white line.Longtitute and Latitude markings given for locations on the cable's route including Khaseifa Island and Ras Zarwan light. The sounding depth of the cable also given.Bahrein Harbour also marked on map.Soundings given in feet.Tracing from Chart No. 3380Signed by Commander C A Sherwood of Cable Ship Lady Denison Pender.
